snippet: The government said on Thursday that a terrorist attack there in the country was “highly likely.”
abstract: Great Britain’s government tells all British travelers to leave Tunisia because other terrorist attacks there are eminent; comes amid Tunisian investigation finding that militants have targeted Western tourists in attacks in Sousse and Tunis.

byline.original: By STEPHEN CASTLE and CARLOTTA GALL
byline.contributor: Stephen Castle reported from London, and Carlotta Gall from Tunis.

lead_paragraph: The government said on Thursday that a terrorist attack there in the country was “highly likely.”

headline.main: British Tourists Should Leave Tunisia, London Says
headline.print_headline: Citing Terrorism Risk, Britain Tells Citizens to Leave Tunisia
